From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The computer inside the Decepticon base initiated all standard defense
procedures. "Attention, all available Decepticons. Two unidentified
signatures are on board. Head to the second floor (where Squawktalk is)
or to main computer room" it hummed. Every where on the ship a siren was
sounding, and warning lights flickered.
